com.optimizely.ab.android.datafile_handler

Class DefaultDatafileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.optimizely.ab.android.datafile_handler.DefaultDatafileHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatafileHandler

    public class DefaultDatafileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatafileHandler
    The default implementation of DatafileHandler and the main interaction point to the datafile-handler module.

    • Method Detail

      • downloadDatafile

        public java.lang.String downloadDatafile(android.content.Context context,
                                         DatafileConfig datafileConfig)
        Synchronous call to download the datafile. Gets the file on the current thread from the Optimizely CDN.
        Specified by:
        downloadDatafile in interface DatafileHandler
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        datafileConfig - DatafileConfig for the datafile
        Returns:
        a valid datafile or null

      • downloadDatafile

        public void downloadDatafile(android.content.Context context,
                             DatafileConfig datafileConfig,
                             DatafileLoadedListener listener)
        Asynchronous download data file.

        We create a DatafileService intent, create a DataService connection, and bind it to the application context. After we receive the datafile, we unbind the service and cleanup the service connection. This gets the project file from the Optimizely CDN.

        Specified by:
        downloadDatafile in interface DatafileHandler
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        datafileConfig - DatafileConfig for the datafile to get
        listener - listener to call when datafile download complete

      • startBackgroundUpdates

        public void startBackgroundUpdates(android.content.Context context,
                                   DatafileConfig datafileConfig,
                                   java.lang.Long updateInterval)
        Start background checks if the the project datafile jas been updated. This starts an alarm service that checks to see if there is a new datafile to download at interval provided. If there is a update, the new datafile is cached.
        Specified by:
        startBackgroundUpdates in interface DatafileHandler
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        datafileConfig - DatafileConfig for the datafile
        updateInterval - frequency of updates in seconds

      • getUpdateInterval
